v.v: Yahweh, work against those who work against me;
Grab your small shield and large shield;
Use your spear and battle ax against those who chase me;
May those who seek my life be shamed and dishonored.
May they be as chaff before the wind,
May their way be dark and slippery,
Without cause they set their net for me;
Let destruction overtake them by surprise.
But I will be joyful in Yahweh
All my bones will say, “Yahweh, who is like you,
Unrighteous witnesses rise up;
They repay me evil for good.
But, when they were sick, I wore sackcloth;
I went about in grief as for my brother;
But when I stumbled, they rejoiced and gathered together;
With no respect at all they mocked me;
Lord, how long will you look on?
Then I will thank you in the great assembly;
Do not let my deceitful enemies rejoice over me;
For they do not speak peace,
They open their mouths wide against me;
You have seen it, Yahweh, do not be silent;
Arouse yourself and awake to my defense;
Defend me, Yahweh my God, because of your righteousness;
Do not let them say in their heart, “Aha, we have what we wanted.”
May they be put to shame and may they be confounded who rejoice at my distress.
Let those who desire my vindication shout for joy and be glad;
Then I will tell of your justice

v: fight against those who fight against me.
rise up and help me.
say to my soul, “I am your salvation.”
May those who plan to harm me be turned back and confounded.
as the angel of Yahweh drives them away.
as the angel of Yahweh chases them.
without cause they dug a pit for my life.
Let the net that they have set catch them.
Let them fall into it, to their destruction.
and rejoice in his salvation.
who rescues the oppressed from those who are too strong for them
and the poor and needy from those who try to rob them?”
they accuse me falsely.
I am sorrowful.
I fasted for them
with my head bowed on my chest.
I bent down in mourning as for my mother.
they gathered together against me, and I was surprised by them.
They tore at me without stopping.
they grind their teeth at me in rage.
Rescue my soul from their destructive attacks,
my life from the lions.
I will praise you among many people.
do not let them carry out their wicked schemes.
but they devise deceitful words against those in our land who live in peace.
they said, “Aha, Aha, our eyes have seen it.”
Lord, do not be far from me.
My God and my Lord, defend my cause.
do not let them rejoice over me.
Do not let them say, “We have devoured him.”
May those who exalt themselves over me be clothed with shame and dishonor.
may they say continually, “Yahweh be praised,
he who delights in the welfare of his servant.”
and praise you all day long.
